title: My ping has jumped from 50-52   to 72-74 after 7.11. Any suggestions welcome!
body:
My ping has jumped from 50-52   to 72-74 after 7.11. Any suggestions welcome!
Thanks!

replies.body:
I might be able to offer a little more context as to what's going on here. 

When you patch your client, there are of course a lot of files in the background that change and get updated. Sometimes when the files are changed, your network also needs a little updating to make sure you can still get a solid connection with our servers. Let's go over some of those [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there first, but definitely hit me back up if that doesn't smooth out your ping!

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||[Re-establish efficient network communications with the League severs.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)|
|-

||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||https://puu.sh/w6V29/dc98f0c6a9.jpg|
|-
---
|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||Reduced ping should be accomplished afterwards.|
|-
Why would a patch increase my ping?
It wouldn't. It's something else which is increasing your ping, proceed to the article I linked, let us know if your ping is reduced afterwards.
